slides.title: Invoice Automation

content.headline: Send Invoices Automatically, Get Paid Faster

slides.narration: Chasing payments is exhausting. Automated invoicing sends bills immediately after service, follows up on overdue payments, and accepts payments online. Let's eliminate the accounts receivable headache.

slides.title: What You'll Set Up
slides.narration: We'll set up professional invoice templates, triggers that send invoices automatically, online payment methods so customers can pay immediately, and follow-up sequences for overdue invoices.

slides.title: Step 1: Invoice Template
slides.narration: Create your invoice template. Add your logo and branding for professionalism. Include all business details—name, address, tax ID if needed. Set payment terms like net thirty. List accepted payment methods. Optionally include your late fee policy.

slides.title: Step 2: Sending Triggers
slides.narration: Configure when invoices send automatically. After service completed—invoice goes out immediately. On recurring schedule for subscription clients. When project milestones are hit. Or manual send with one click when you need control. Mix and match for different client types.

slides.title: Step 3: Payment Setup
slides.narration: Enable online payments—this is crucial. Accept credit and debit cards. Add ACH bank transfer for lower fees. Offer payment plans for larger invoices. Set up auto-pay for recurring clients. Invoices with online payment links get paid twice as fast on average.

slides.title: Step 4: Follow-Up Sequence
slides.narration: Set up automatic follow-ups. Reminder three days before due date. Another on the due date. Overdue notice three days after. Second reminder at seven days. Final notice at fourteen days. All automatic—no awkward chasing required.

slides.title: Pro Tips

tips: Send invoices same day as service

slides.narration: Invoice pro tips. Shorter payment terms mean faster payment—try net fifteen instead of net thirty. Offer a small discount for early payment—two percent off if paid within seven days works well. Send invoices the same day as service while value is fresh. Review your aging report weekly to catch problems early.

slides.title: Start Automating
slides.narration: Ready to get paid faster? Set up automated invoicing now. Or browse invoice templates first to find a professional look that fits your brand. Stop chasing payments—let automation handle it.
